contents.text:
Your resourcefulness in overcoming this
trial speaks to the promise of a hero.

In the name of the Goddess Hylia,
I bestow upon you this gift...
Naboris's Emblem.

Now that you have collected
three emblems, you must go
to Divine Beast Vah Naboris...

Your resourcefulness in overcoming this
trial speaks to the promise of a hero.

In the name of the Goddess Hylia,
I bestow upon you this gift...
Rudania's Emblem.

Now that you have collected
three emblems, you must go
to Divine Beast Vah Rudania...

Your resourcefulness in overcoming this
trial speaks to the promise of a hero.

In the name of the Goddess Hylia,
I bestow upon you this gift...
Medoh's Emblem.

Now that you have collected
three emblems, you must go
to Divine Beast Vah Medoh...

Your resourcefulness in overcoming this
trial speaks to the promise of a hero.

In the name of the Goddess Hylia,
I bestow upon you this gift...
Ruta's Emblem.

Now that you have collected
three emblems, you must go
to Divine Beast Vah Ruta...

Collect three emblems to open the path
to a new challenge.
